channel.title: Server restarter Info Please
channel.description:
on i need to find a auto restarter that can restart 2 servers at the same time.
when i use my auto restarter on one server it automatically shuts down both servers that are running and only turns back on the server with the auto restarter.
i host a 317 and a 508. any help would be fantastic.
im thinking maby if there is an auto restarter which u can change the process name like (RUN1.bat and RUN2.bat) so it will think its restarting 2 and not 2 .bats with the same process.
...if you did not understand the last part of what i said dont worry :)
